<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>false</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>Allow read for u_approved_rejected_time in sysapproval_approver, if the ACL script returns true.</description><name>sysapproval_approver.u_approved_rejected_time</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script><![CDATA[var assignmentGrp = current.group.assignment_group.getDisplayValue();
if((assignmentGrp == 'GxP QA Approval' && gs.getUser().isMemberOf('GxP QA Approval')) || (assignmentGrp == 'SOX QA Approval' && gs.getUser().isMemberOf('SOX QA Approval'))) {
	
	answer = true;
	
}

else {
	
	answer = false;
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>surya</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-11-03 10:50:39</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>1f2646f44fefc20023bf3879b110c7ca</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>sysapproval_approver.u_approved_rejected_time</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_1f2646f44fefc20023bf3879b110c7ca</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>surya</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-11-03 11:12:04</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_2e1ed9bc4fafc20023bf3879b110c732
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sysapproval_approver</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>true</execute_function><filter_condition/><message/><name>Approved/Rejected date and time</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[function onBefore(current, previous) {
	//This function will be automatically called when this rule is processed.
	var assignmentGrp = current.group.assignment_group.getDisplayValue();
	gs.log('====assignmnetGrp====='+assignmentGrp);
	if(current.state.changesTo('approved') || current.state.changesTo('rejected')) {
		if((assignmentGrp == 'GxP QA Approval' && gs.getUser().isMemberOf('GxP QA Approval')) || (assignmentGrp == 'SOX QA Approval' && gs.getUser().isMemberOf('SOX QA Approval'))) {
			var ApprovedDateTime = gs.nowDateTime();
			current.u_approved_rejected_time = ApprovedDateTime;
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>surya</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-11-03 08:01:20</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2e1ed9bc4fafc20023bf3879b110c732</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Approved/Rejected date and time</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Online exam scheduler " source="NULL">67937ecf7b49f500bc2526824b4d4d80</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Online exam scheduler ">67937ecf7b49f500bc2526824b4d4d80</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_2e1ed9bc4fafc20023bf3879b110c732</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>surya</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-11-03 11:09:11</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2e1ed9bc4fafc20023bf3879b110c732"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_164fcdb04faa820023bf3879b110c7bc
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ChangeUtils</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>ChangeUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var ChangeUtils = Class.create();
ChangeUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	checkCABday : function() {
		var daysOfWeek = ['Monday','Tuesday','Wednesday','Thursday','Friday','Saturday','Sunday'];
		var validCabDays = gs.getProperty('cab.meeting.days').split(',');
		var requiredCabDays = [];
		var selectedCabDate = this.getParameter('sysparm_cab_date');
		var gdt = new GlideDateTime(selectedCabDate+" 00:00:00");
		var selectedDayOfWeek = gdt.getDayOfWeekUTC();
		var flag = false;
		
		for(var i=0; i<validCabDays.length; i++) {
			if(selectedDayOfWeek.toString() == validCabDays[i]) {
				flag = true;
				break;
			}
				requiredCabDays.push(daysOfWeek[parseInt(validCabDays[i])-1].toString());
		}
		
		if(!flag) {
			return 'Please choose a date falls on ' + requiredCabDays.toString().replace(/,/g,'/') + '!';
		}
		return '';
	},
	
	isQAapprover : function() {
	var approvalSysId = this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id');
	var ApprovalFor = this.getParameter('sysparm_approval_for');
	var ApproverName = gs.getUser().getUserById(this.getParameter('sysparm_approver'));
	var assignmentGrp = '';
	
	var approval = new GlideRecord('sysapproval_approver');
	approval.addQuery('sys_id',approvalSysId);
	approval.query();
	
	if(approval.next()) {
		ApprovalFor = approval.getValue('sysapproval');
		//ApproverName = gs.getUser().getUserById(approval.getValue('approver'));
		assignmentGrp = approval.group.assignment_group.getDisplayValue();
		if((assignmentGrp == 'GxP QA Approval' && gs.getUser().isMemberOf('GxP QA Approval')) || (assignmentGrp == 'SOX QA Approval' && gs.getUser().isMemberOf('SOX QA Approval'))) {
			return true;
		}
	}
	return false;
},

	
	type: 'ChangeUtils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>surya</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-09-14 13:52:50</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>164fcdb04faa820023bf3879b110c7bc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ChangeUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_164fcdb04faa820023bf3879b110c7bc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>surya</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-11-03 09:58:47</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
